title: 7 Meanings of seeing figs in a dream

preview.html: 7 Meanings of seeing figs in a dream Seeing figs in a dream is news of kindness, blessing, and a good child. Together we learn about the conditions for seeing figs in a dream through this article. What is the interpretation of seeing figs in a dream? This means a lot of money. The meaning of seeing black figs? Evidence of Dissatisfaction. What is the interpretation of seeing him eating figs? Evidence of grace and kindness. The meaning of seeing that he is picking figs? Evidence that he will get a lot of money. What is the interpretation of seeing figs in a pregnant woman’s dream? Evidence of the attractive beauty of the child. Seeing figs in a dream according to Ibn Sirintshir Seeing figs in a dream indicates a lot of money. Seeing fig trees in a dream indicates a wealthy and prestigious man. After that, seeing figs in a dream provides you with livelihood and children. Eating figs in a dream indicates lawful money. Whoever dreams of eating figs will have many offspring. Then seeing figs in a dream out of season means envy. Seeing black figs is evidence of dissatisfaction. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s vision of a fig tree. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating from a fig tree, this is a sign of blessing and goodness. When someone sees him putting his hand in a fig tree, he will get what he wants. Then seeing figs in a dream indicates the recovery of the sick person. Interpretation of the vision of an unmarried woman: Seeing figs for single people indicates the goodness that she will get. Then seeing one fig in a dream means a good newborn wife. Figs for single people indicate abundance of money and kindness. And seeing dried figs is evidence of her marriage. From a generous man. When an unmarried woman sees figs on the tree and eats them, she will succeed in her life. If she sees figs in her dream and does not eat them, she will face some problems in her life. Seeing figs in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who dreams that she is eating figs gets rid of her worries. Whoever sees in a dream that she is taking figs from her husband, this dream is good news of pregnancy. Figs in a dream for a married woman. Happy news is on her way. Interpretation of seeing a fig tree for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she has figs, then she will give birth to a boy. Then seeing figs in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence On the beauty of the beautiful child. Interpretation of seeing a fig tree for a man. When a man sees dried figs in a dream, he will have money. Figs are an indication of the marriage of a single man. Then if he sees in a dream that he is taking figs from his wife, then he will receive good news and lawful money. When he dreams that he is picking figs , he will get a lot of money.

title: Interpretation of a dream about being stabbed in the back by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a knife with a knife in the back: It is an undesirable dream because it causes discomfort and anxiety to its owner, although it is not necessarily a sign of harm or harm to the pioneer. A large number of interpretation scholars have mentioned it and mentioned some interpretations for it that differ depending on their differences. The social status of the Lord except for the one who stabbed him and the events he saw in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about a knife with a knife in the back. Seeing a stabbing in the back in a dream indicates the dreamer’s effort and diligence in reality to achieve the goals and objectives that he wants, and this also leads to the intensity of his ambition and that he always wants to be the best. Regardless of the obstacles and crises you face. The reason for the stab in the back is due to many competitors around the fortune teller and he is trying to outdo them and get rid of them. The dream of being stabbed in the back with a knife symbolizes the revelation of some betrayals that the viewer is exposed to to those around him and that this will cause him harm and damage. In his life, he must be very careful. When a dreamer sees in his dream that he is stabbing another person with a knife, this is a sign of the dreamer’s feeling of guilt and remorse for causing harm or harm to that person in reality, and God knows best. Stabbing a knife in the back in general is one of the dreams that indicates Falling into various crises and tribulations. When a dreamer sees himself stabbed with a knife in a dream, this is a sign that he is worried about some things or a sign that he has some fears that he is afraid of. Interpretation of a dream about being stabbed in the back by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a knife stabbed from behind in a dream is an omen It is good for a single person because it leads to his marriage contract in the coming period. Whoever holds a knife and prepares to stab someone from behind is a dream that shows the intensity of the person’s ambition and that he is trying hard to achieve all the goals and objectives that he wants. A dreamer who stabs another person he really knows from behind in a dream is considered a sign On his feeling of guilt towards this person for committing some foolishness against him. The dreamer who sees himself in a dream receiving a knife from the vision, which indicates the deterioration of the dreamer’s psychological and nervous state during this period. Stabbing in the back with a knife leads to the dreamer’s distrust of those around him and that he lacks feeling. With safety and security. Seeing someone stabbing himself in the back repeatedly means bad behavior and some immoral actions such as harm, gossip, and lying in conversation. Interpretation of a dream about stabbing in the back for a single woman. An unmarried girl, if she sees herself stabbed in the back with a knife in her dream, this is a sign of failure and failure of insight. In her life and not achieving the ambitions and goals she wants. The visionary person who faces a stab in the back and is not harmed by it is an indication that he will fall into a financial crisis that will pass soon, and God knows best. Seeing the same girl being stabbed in the back by someone he does not know is one of the dreams that It symbolizes haters and jealous people around the dreamer, and he must be careful before giving trust and security to others. For a girl who is not yet married, if she dreams that she is holding a shiny, sharp knife and trying to confront someone who is cheating on her, this will lead to the strength of the dreamer’s personality and her many ambitions.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Sweets in a dream are a very confusing issue in its interpretation, because some dream interpreters see it as a vision that carries many positive meanings for the dreamer, while others see it as a vision that has connotations of trouble and turmoil, so we will present it. You have the difference in the opinions of dream interpreters to see sweets in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that eating sweets for a man in a dream indicates the presence of many beautiful women in this man's life. If this man is married and loyal to his wife, eating sweets indicates emotional stability between the man and his wife. If the owner of the dream is a merchant, seeing his sweets in a dream means profit in trade and earning a lot of money in the coming period. As for the unmarried young man, sweets indicate frequent intercourse with women in a forbidden way and he must repent and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq tells us that sweets indicate the positive thinking present in the dreamer that controls all the decisions he makes. Offering sweets to guests in a dream indicates the good reputation of the owner of the dream and his sweet tongue. Sweets in a pregnant woman's dream may be evidence that she will give birth to a child, and God Almighty knows best. Sweets in a pregnant woman's dream may be an indication that this woman faced some health problems during pregnancy. If the owner of the dream eats sweets in his dream greedily, he will suffer from many problems and crises, especially health crises. Interpretation of seeing Sweets in a dream for a single woman Many dream scholars interpreted seeing sweets in the dream of an unmarried girl as an approach to marrying a person of good character and achieving happiness and stability for her. Eating a lot of single sweets also indicates that good is coming to her and her family. An unmarried woman may see in her dream a handsome man guided by sweets, and this vision promises to improve emotional and family relationships by the command of God. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a married woman Sweets in a dream for a married woman are a good reputation for her and her husband among people, and financial and family stability is near. Eating sweets for married people in a dream provides a generous source of livelihood and a decent life to enjoy. The abundance of sweets in a married woman is evidence of her achieving the dreams and wishes she seeks, and the husband can be prominent in doing God's command. A gift of sweets in a dream Singles may see themselves appearing to many people in different shapes and forms. This indicates the achievement of dreams, ambitions and a good reputation. In other places, we see that a man’s gift to his wife is sweet in a dream, good news about early pregnancy, improving marital relations between them, and obtaining a high position at work. Giving a single person sweets to a girl in a dream is something close to marriage and great happiness for his family. Different indications of seeing sweets in a dream Sweet in a dream, the husband’s devotion, and the quiet life in which he is blessed

Eating a lot of single sweets also indicates that good is coming for her and her family. It can be For an unmarried woman to see in her dream a handsome man who is guided by sweets, and this vision promises the improvement of emotional and family relationships by God’s command. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a married woman Giving candy in a dream provides a decent source of livelihood and a decent life to enjoy. The abundance of sweets in a married woman is evidence of her fulfillment of the dreams and wishes she seeks, and the husband can be prominent in doing God’s command. A gift of candy in a dream. Single women may see themselves appearing as many people in shapes and forms. Different. This indicates the fulfillment of dreams, ambitions, and a good reputation. In other places we see that a man’s gift to his wife is sweet in a dream, good news about early pregnancy, improving marital relations between them, and obtaining a high position at work. Single men giving a sweet girl in a dream is something close to Marriage and great happiness for his family. Various indications to see sweets in dreamsSweet in a dream, devotion of the husband, and a peaceful life in which you are blessed

title: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream for an unmarried woman according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream for a single woman According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, seeing the Blessed Messenger and Islamic places are beautiful dreams that make the dreamer feel slow and close to his Creator. Encourage him to commit to worship to see more dreams related to his Creator and to visit the places he wants to see, such as the Prophet’s Mosque, which he saw repeatedly in the dreams of many people, so in this article today we will learn together the interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream for a single woman according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream for a single woman: The dream interpreter, Ibn Sirin, says that if an unmarried girl sees the Prophet’s Mosque in her dream, then her dream indicates that she will soon marry a person who respects morals. This dream may indicate that the dreamer’s life will change for the better and that God The Almighty will make her happy and she will be able to achieve what she seeks. Dream interpretation scholar Ibn Shaheen says that seeing the Prophet’s Mosque in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that her affairs will ease in the near future. Whoever sees the Prophet’s Mosque in her dream, her dream indicates that God will bless her in her life. , and may give her the opportunity to travel soon. Such a vision may indicate that there is a lot of good food on the way to her. If the dreamer is looking for a job, then the vision is good news for her that God will soon give her a job opportunity. The unmarried girl is rebuilding the mosque The Prophet’s dream is that God will marry her to a religious young man with good morals. A girl who listens to the Holy Qur’an in the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream or listens to a religious lecture in it means that her marriage will take place soon. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is digging a hole in the Prophet’s Mosque, this indicates However, her marriage is imminent. Interpretation of a dream about praying in the Prophet’s Mosque for single women. An unmarried woman bathing in the Prophet’s Mosque in preparation for prayer in a dream is evidence that she is close to marriage. This vision also shows that God will fulfill all of the visionary’s desires and that he will always answer her prayers to Him. If the dreamer is engaged and dreams that she If she prays inside the Prophet’s Mosque, the dream indicates that her marriage is approaching. The girl who prays in the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream symbolizes that there is something that worries and worries the viewer, but she will feel comfortable and reassured about it. This vision also indicates that its owner has a good biography and a medical reputation among everyone. Around.Interpretation of seeing the green dome of the Prophet’s Mosque in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream the green dome of the Prophet’s Mosque, then her dreams indicate her satisfaction with what God has commanded her to do, and that God Almighty will protect her in her life. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is helping in building this Dome, it means that she enjoys stability and has high ambitions. There are many circumstances under which it is possible to distinguish between an ordinary dream that has no meaning related to reality and a dream that carries messages for the person to understand, act on, and seek to interpret. Many imams have explained this

title: Interpretation of the deceased in a dream: I dream of death and the deceased in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Seeing the dead, single, married, pregnant, divorced, married and a single young man, whether it is the deceased father, brother, beloved husband, fiancé, bachelor, the meaning of the dead is laughing alive or sick, crying, smiling, eating, returning to life and more by Ibn SirinDeath in dreams In general it indicates good news, almost comfort and long life. It has many interpretations, each interpretation differs according to its vision in the dream. Death is interpreted as returning deposits, saving the sick person from his illness or the prisoner from his prison, and meeting the absent person. If death is accompanied by crying and screaming and not burial in the ground, then it is a deficiency in the religion, corruption in it, and greatness in this world. And if he is buried, no good is expected from him. And if you dream that you are dead, but it does not seem that you are dying, this indicates the weakness of your faith, as well as poverty and travel. Death, in the general sense, means marriage, while marriage is death. And if you see that you are dead, and people carry you on their shoulders, But do not bury me, for you will defeat your enemies and your condition will improve. Reviving you shows that you will become rich, or you will repent for your misrepresentation and return from travels. But if you dream of the death of a person who dies for the second time, this is interpreted as the death of a member of his family. If you see a dead woman sick, she will not rest in the afterlife, and her bad deeds outweigh her bad deeds. If you see a woman you do not know dying, you will hear the news of the death of a sick child and vice versa. Discovering a dead body means finding money. In the event that you are afraid of death because you were sick and dreamed of it, do not worry. You will soon hear good news, and also seeing the death of a brother means getting rid of worries and making money. Walking behind the dead indicates the presence of hypocrites in your life, and whoever sees that he has died, and sees his death, funeral, gathering, washing, and shrouding, his worldly life was safe and his religion was corrupt. Death in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says about the dream of death that if the sleeper sees that he died while he was naked on the ground, then this A person is affected by poverty, and whoever dies and dies again means the death of someone close to him. It also says that if a person sees in a dream that his son has died, this means that this person will leave his wife and will not have contact with her until she dies, but if he sees that his partner has died This indicates divorce. Dead in a dream. If one sees in a dream that he finds a dead person, this means that this person will receive a lot of money without effort, but if a person in a dream receives news of the death of someone he does not know, this indicates that the person will receive bad news.dream Death in a man’s dream: Seeing death in a man’s dream means that this dream has many different meanings. If a man sees in a dream that his father has died, this indicates a long life for the person. However, if he sees that his mother has died, this indicates an increase in the strength of faith and piety. However, if he sees the death of a brother in a dream, this means that that person will benefit from his brother. If a person sees the death of his sister in a dream, this means that he is in a state of joy. Dream of death in one dream. Commentators say that seeing death in one dream, if a girl sees in her dream the death of a relative of hers, but she does not scream at him or grieve over him,

title: A detailed interpretation of the key in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Today, through the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of the Key in a Dream, we present to the single woman, where the only girl who will come to life always hopes for good news from Almighty God and dreams consider the world full of secrets and mysteries. A sign and symbol of a person's confidence or lack thereof, as people are always afraid of other visions, they are praiseworthy and take refuge in God Almighty, as they always look forward to happy and joyful news, especially for those who are waiting for something like work. Or marriage, pregnancy, or childbirth, this is how everyone sees it with their own eyes. The science of dream interpretation is a large sea with its leaders and scholars, and there are many prominent dream interpreters in this field. Below we learn about seeing the key in a dream and what it indicates. Interpretation of the key in a dream for a single woman. A single woman who obtains a Keys in a dream indicate good luck and abundant food that you will enjoy. Seeing keys in an unmarried woman’s dream while giving them to one of her loved ones symbolizes a lot of kindness. If an unmarried woman sees herself opening a door, this indicates a happy new life, and indicates marriage. From a good person. Opening the door in front of her in a dream is interpreted as obtaining a new job position. Keys in one dream are interpreted as victory, relief, and victory over enemies. But if the door is closed with a key in an unmarried woman’s dream, this may symbolize bad Luck and dealing with some problems. Closing the door with the key in her face may symbolize her rejection of marriage. Losing the key in a dream is evidence of wasting time and waiting for something that is not fulfilled. With her home and children, and here is the interpretation of the dream of giving a key to a married woman: Giving a key in a dream to a married woman portends a lot of goodness and obtaining ample livelihood. The wife having the key in her hand indicates a great deal of sustenance, comfort, and security. Giving a married woman a key symbolizes goodness, wealth, and luck. The big one. A married woman’s vision of a key is interpreted as an imminent pregnancy, and its completion is good, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a key for a pregnant woman. title: Interpretation of a penguin in a dream and a flying penguin in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a penguin for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, if the eggs of birds that eat penguin meat are chasing me for Ibn Sirin Penguin Interpretation of a penguin in a dream Seeing a penguin indicates that despite limited capabilities, you will achieve your goals and achieve important results Seeing a dead penguin indicates insurmountable difficulties Seeing a penguin often indicates the suffering and difficulties that the dreamer faces, but success depends on your ability to persevere and resist. As for seeing a penguin, it indicates that your problems are not as difficult and serious as you think, and it may indicate that you are immersed in negative feelings or emotions. If one sees a penguin in a dream, it may mean that his problems are not as serious as one thinks and that they can be solved. This indicates that he should remain calm. Seeing a penguin in a dream can indicate your feelings. If one sees a penguin in a dream, it may mean that the person needs balance and harmony within himself. Some scholars and interpreters have said that if one sees a bird in a dream, it may indicate power and money. It has been said that if one sees birds in a dream and that person is a merchant, then this likely indicates that the trade of that merchant will be profitable. If one sees that a bird has fallen on him in a dream, it may mean that he will travel. Seeing large birds in a dream indicates sultans, rulers, and kings. If one sees in a dream that a bird descends to the ground and picks up a worm and then flies to the sky and the dreamer is sick, then this may indicate death. Interpretation of Penguin in a Dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing a penguin in a dream is one of the visions that can be interpreted as a vision of good or a vision of evil, depending on the nature of the dream or the circumstances of the dreamer. Some scholars and interpreters have said that if one sees a penguin in a dream, it may indicate that his problems are not as serious as one thinks and that they can be solved, meaning that one should remain calm. It is possible that seeing a penguin in a dream shows your emotions, and some of them said that if one sees a penguin in a dream, it may mean that the person needs balance and harmony within himself. Some scholars and interpreters said: If one sees a bird in a dream, it may be evidence of power and money. Some of them said: If one sees that a bird has fallen on him in a dream, this may indicate that he will travel and see large birds in a dream refers to sultans, rulers and kings. If one sees in a dream that a bird has landed on the ground and picked up a worm and then flew to the sky and the dreamer was sick, this may indicate that he may die. Interpretation of the penguin in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq At first, we must mention that seeing a penguin in a dream means peace and tolerance and is one of the signs and indications that indicate friendliness and love.. Happiness on an emotional level. The penguin can refer to the future husband if an unmarried woman sees it in its natural black and white color and an unmarried girl sees the penguin running away from her

title: Interpretation of a kiss on the mouth in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: Because kissing is one of the concepts of love in which each individual expresses his feelings to the other, but it differs in the way a man or woman looks at it. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the mouth in a dream about a single girl When a single girl sees someone kissing her in a dream, she will have a lot of love and feelings. Vision A single girl is kissed by someone in a dream. It means that he is going through difficult circumstances, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In other interpretations, it was said that seeing a kiss on her mouth in a dream for a single girl. It is a sign that he is marrying someone he loves and wants to marry in reality. It may indicate marriage to a relative. Or a neighbor. Kissing on the mouth in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she will enter into many conflicts with the person who does this act. Whereas if the unmarried girl dreams that she is kissing a member of her family. The vision showed the communication that will occur between her and the other party. The vision can be interpreted A kiss on the mouth by an unknown person for an unmarried girl. By entering into a new love relationship, or without feelings, the person remains. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the neck for a divorced woman. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the mouth in a dream for a married woman. A husband kissing his wife in a woman’s mouth A married woman is a sign of mutual love between the husband for his wife or vice versa. While she saw a married woman trying to kiss her husband in a dream, but he turned away from her. It is an indication of the presence or creation of some existing problems between the two parties, and God knows best. A kiss from a stranger in a married woman’s dream. It is an indication of That there are some things that she hides from some people, and God knows best. It may indicate some special circumstances that she will go through during her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And in the interpretation of seeing kisses from a friend in a married woman’s dream. The vision could indicate trying to find out a lot about those people. Friends and getting close to them. The dream of a married woman kissing someone known to her in the dream. It could be a strong friendship to gain between her and that person, or it is a great benefit between the two sides. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the mouth in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing a kiss on the mouth in a dream of a married man from Symbols that have more than one meaning. It shows a dream about a married man kissing his wife. It expresses understanding and love between the two parties, and perhaps shows marital stability. Or it is a sign of the arrival of multiple phases of goodness and blessing in the home. Interpretation of seeing a kiss from a man to a man in a married man’s dream It indicates the presence of some common interests between the two parties, or it is an exchange of benefits and interests. A dream about a kiss on the mouth indicates an unknown woman in a married man’s dream. To get rid of obstacles that were already present in insight. And in the interpretation of seeing a kiss from one person to another in a married man’s dream. It is evidence of some knowledge that the dreamer will gain from the other person. If a married man sees that he is kissing a girl he does not know in a dream. The vision indicates the occurrence of inappropriate behavior, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss in a dream by Ibn Sirin Meaning of seeing a kiss from The mouth in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A kiss in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates m

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a car in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a car in a dream in detail. Many people dream of seeing a car in a dream, as seeing a car in a dream varies from one person to another, and for this reason we will know what are the different signs that dreaming of a car in a dream shows for a married woman, a pregnant woman, interpretation of a black taxi for a single woman, interpretation of dreams about buying a car, Seeing riding a car, car key, body, interpretation of car color, car engine, driving a car, driving a car in a dream, car brakes, seeing buying a car, seeing a car buying a car, seeing a car in a dream, seeing a woman driving a car, this will be done in detail and in detail. Clear according to leading Arab translators and scholars. Therefore, you have to explain in detail the dream of a car in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a car in a dream:Seeing a dreamer driving a car in a dream, which is unknown to him, indicates a change in the situation for me. Seeing a dilapidated car in a dream may indicate a bad biography of the dreamer Among people. A dream about driving a car is evidence of the pursuit of goals that you want to achieve for a pregnant woman. Seeing a taxi with a familiar font indicates food and kindness, and a truck in a dream indicates the dreamer’s lack of livelihood. A dreamer who skillfully drove a car in a dream is a sign of his independence and knows How he does things in life. Seeing the latest luxury car in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has a strong personality. As for seeing an old car in a dream, it is an indication of the dreamer’s weak personality. The interpretation of dreaming about a car in a dream is running at a speed that is an indication that he has great vitality and vitality, whether In the practical field or in his life. Interpretation of a dream about a car for a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about a car in a dream for a woman in a dream is good news for marriage soon. Dreaming about a car in a dream for a single woman indicates a family meeting. Interpretation of a dream about a woman driving a car as a sign of kindness and joy. Interpretation of a vision A green car in a dream is evidence of the good conduct of the person driving it. Interpretation of a car in a dream for a person is a sign of ambition and success. Interpretation of a dream about a car for a pregnant woman: The interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a married woman in a dream indicates a transition to a better financial situation. The interpretation of seeing a woman explains A married woman in a dream means that the situation is actually easy. Seeing a car in a dream for a married woman is a sign of the strength of a woman’s character. Interpretation of a dream about driving in a car with her husband is a married woman’s evidence about the connection and the strength of the bond between them. Interpretation of a dream about a new car for a married woman is an indication of her change in status. Better. Interpretation of a dream about a car for a married woman: Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a married woman in a dream indicates a transition to a better financial situation. Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream for a married woman shows that the situation is actually easy. Seeing a car in a dream for a married woman is a sign of the strength of a woman’s character Interpretation of a dream about driving in a car with her husband is a married woman’s evidence about the connection and the strength of the bond between them. Interpretation of a dream about a new car for a married woman is an indication of her change of heart.
